14159.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Sorry to keep you waiting.
Here I am, Gaurad.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001><cs_pchero> is here, too? That's fine.

14160.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>大人也来了啊。

14160.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>閣下也來了啊。

14161.en:

<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「で　なんの用なんだ？

14161.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 그런데 왜 부른 거야?
　잔소리라면 사양이야.

14161.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>于是，找我有什么事？
如果是唠叨，我可不想再听了。

14161.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>所以，找我有什麼事嗎？
如果是嘮叨，我可不想再聽了。
我現在可是很努力的。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14162.en: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>This is goodbye, Master Yarn.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14166.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Oi, oi. Your jokes are as boring as ever. At

<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「おいおい。お前の　じょうだんは

14166.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>喂喂。你开的玩笑

<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>I have made it my mission to kill the one who

<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>杀死拥有超天道士名号的人，

14169.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>I am Warrior Demon Gaurad... I came from the

14169.zh-Hans:

14169.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>為了打敗超天道士而從魔界前來的使者──

<start_lip_sync m08202 _normal m00001>但是，造化弄人啊……

<start_lip_sync m08202 _normal m00001>就算打倒那种病怏怏的超天道士，

<start_lip_sync m08202 _normal m00001>所以，我一直在等，
